title: Ordering food to be taken out
context: Ask the restaurant to package your entire meal so you can leave with it.

content.bestLine: Can I get my order to go, please?

neutral.text: I'd like to take my meal out
Can you package my order to go?
I'll take my food with me
Can I get my order packaged?
I'd like my meal to be taken out
Can you make my order to go?
I need my food to take out
Can I take my order with me?

informal.text: Can I grab my order to go?
I'm gonna take my food with me
Can you throw my order in a box?
I'll just take my meal to go
Can I get my order togo?
Can you make my order portable?
I need my order on the go

formal.text: I would like to request my order to be taken out
Could you please package my meal to go?
I require my order to be prepared for take-out
May I have my order packaged to go?
I would appreciate it if you could make my order to go
Could you arrange for my order to be taken out?

patterns.template: Can I get my [options] to go?
patterns.meaning: requesting to take out the entire meal
asking for the order to be prepared for take-out

dialogs.description: Customer ordering food to take out

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Can I get my order to go, please?

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Absolutely, I'll package it for you right away

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Just to confirm, my order is to go, right?

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Yes, that's correct. We'll have it ready for you to take out
